entry.content:
January 25, 2020 7:30 pm at Columbia Basin College, Performing Arts Theatre

There is an additional family performance in at 4:00 PM

Charles Wetherbee (Violin)
Marisa Ishikawa (violin)
Korine Fujiwara (viola)
Gregory Sauer (Cello)

Carpe Diem String Quartet website

Program

Piano Quintet in E flat Major, Op. 44 Robert Schumann
Positive Energy Bradley Sowash
Fiddle Suite Montana Korine Fujiwara
String Quartet No. 6, Giga Sergei Taneyev

This program is supported in part by a grant from ArtsWa (the Washington State Arts Commission) and the National Endowment for the Arts.
